revised_title: Charles Blacker Vignoles: A Pioneering Railway Engineer
tldr: The article discusses the life and achievements of Charles Blacker Vignoles, a significant railway engineer of the 19th century. Vignoles made important contributions to railway design, including the development of the Vignoles rail section and the Fell System for locomotives. Despite facing financial challenges, Vignoles left a lasting impact on the railway engineering industry.
